channel.title: Ypsilanti on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Ypsilanti on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Hit and run in Ypsilanti - seeking driver of early 90s Chevy Corsica - Motorcycle accident Friday August 9, 2013 Downtown Ypsilanti (W. Forest Ave at N. Hamilton St. Ypsi)
item.description: A friend of mine was in a motorcycle accident in Ypsilanti on Friday, August 9, 2013. Here's her posting to Craigslist about it - there is a reward offered for identification of the driver that caused the crash. Contact her through this email address: ttrfq-3993561879@comm.craigslist.org  Motorcycle accident 08/09/13 Downtown Ypsilanti (W. Forest Ave at N. Hamilton St. Ypsi) *Possible Reward, if vehicle driver identified* My partner and I were involved in a motorcycle accident around 8:20pm at the corner of W.
